unnormalised: Spotted! Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt looking super cozy at Isha Ambani's Diwali bash! Are those wedding bells we hear AGAIN? This time, sources are saying it's for real, folks!
normalised: Spotted! Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt looking super cozy at Isha Ambani's Diwali bash! Are those wedding bells we hear AGAIN? This time, sources are saying it's for real, folks!

unnormalised: And guess who else was there? Deepika Padukone, looking absolutely radiant, but noticeably solo. Where was Ranveer Singh? Busy filming his next blockbuster, apparently. Talk about dedication!
normalised: And guess who else was there? Deepika Padukone, looking absolutely radiant, but noticeably solo. Where was Ranveer Singh? Busy filming his next blockbuster, apparently. Talk about dedication!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, rumours are swirling about a possible romance brewing between Janhvi Kapoor and Orhan Awatramani. They were practically inseparable all night, fueling speculation that they are more than 'just friends'. Remember how close they were during that trip to Tirupati last year? Hmmm...
